term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dosage in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: dosage

item.text: As applied to an air pollutant in an exposure chamber, dosage is commonly defined as the concentration of the pollutant times the duration of exposure.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2185 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
